short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View who's live on Youtube and Twitch, and get notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to follow channels on Youtube and Twitch, and see in one place who's live and what they're streaming, including things like viewer count, game, and title! You can even import your existing followed and subscribed channels from the platforms. It'll also give you notifications as people start streaming too.
